function.name: begin
function.help: returns the last expression in a sequence after evaluating the sequence in order.

function.name: begin_random
function.help: evaluates the sequence of expressions in random order and returns the last value evaluated.

function.name: if
function.help: returns one of two values based on the value of a condition.

function.name: cond
function.help: returns the value associated with the first true condition.

function.name: set
function.help: set the value of a global variable.

function.name: and
function.help: returns true if all specified expressions are true.

function.name: or
function.help: returns true if any specified expressions are true.
returns the sum of all specified expressions.
returns the difference of two expressions.
returns the product of all specified expressions.
returns the quotient of two expressions.

function.name: min
function.help: returns the minimum of all specified expressions.

function.name: max
function.help: returns the maximum of all specified expressions.
returns true if two expressions are equal
returns true if two expressions are not equal
returns true if the first number is larger than the second.
returns true if the first number is smaller than the second.
returns true if the first number is larger than or equal to the second.
returns true if the first number is smaller than or equal to the second.

function.name: sleep
function.help: pauses execution of this script (or, optionally, another script) for the specified number of ticks.

function.name: sleep_until
function.help: pauses execution of this script until the specified condition is true, checking once per second unless a different number of ticks is specified.

function.name: wake
function.help: wakes a sleeping script in the next update.

function.name: inspect
function.help: prints the value of an expression to the screen for debugging purposes.

function.name: unit
function.help: converts an object to a unit.

function.name: ai_debug_communication_suppress
function.help: suppresses (or stops suppressing) a set of AI communication types.

function.name: ai_debug_communication_ignore
function.help: ignores (or stops ignoring) a set of AI communication types when printing out communications.

function.name: ai_debug_communication_focus
function.help: focuses (or stops focusing) a set of unit vocalization types.

function.name: not
function.help: returns the opposite of the expression.

function.name: print
function.help: prints a string to the console.

function.name: players
function.help: returns a list of the players

function.name: volume_teleport_players_not_inside
function.help: moves all players outside a specified trigger volume to a specified flag.

function.name: volume_test_object
function.help: returns true if the specified object is within the specified volume.

function.name: volume_test_objects
function.help: returns true if any of the specified objects are within the specified volume.

function.name: volume_test_objects_all
function.help: returns true if any of the specified objects are within the specified volume.

function.name: object_teleport
function.help: moves the specified object to the specified flag.

function.name: object_set_facing
function.help: turns the specified object in the direction of the specified flag.

function.name: object_set_shield
function.help: sets the shield vitality of the specified object (between 0 and 1).

function.name: object_set_permutation
function.help: sets the desired region (use "" for all regions) to the permutation with the given name, e.g. (object_set_permutation flood "right arm" ~damaged)

function.name: object_create
function.help: creates an object from the scenario.

function.name: object_destroy
function.help: destroys an object.

function.name: object_create_anew
function.help: creates an object, destroying it first if it already exists.

function.name: object_create_containing
function.help: creates all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

function.name: object_create_anew_containing
function.help: creates anew all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

function.name: object_destroy_containing
function.help: destroys all objects from the scenario whose names contain the given substring.

function.name: object_destroy_all
function.help: destroys all non player objects.

function.name: list_get
function.help: returns an item in an object list.

function.name: list_count
function.help: returns the number of objects in a list

function.name: effect_new
function.help: starts the specified effect at the specified flag.

function.name: effect_new_on_object_marker
function.help: starts the specified effect on the specified object at the specified marker.

function.name: damage_new
function.help: causes the specified damage at the specified flag.

function.name: damage_object
function.help: causes the specified damage at the specified object.

function.name: objects_can_see_object
function.help: returns true if any of the specified units are looking within the specified number of degrees of the object.

function.name: objects_can_see_flag
function.help: returns true if any of the specified units are looking within the specified number of degrees of the flag.

function.name: objects_delete_by_definition
function.help: deletes all objects of type <definition>

function.name: sound_set_gain
function.help: absolutely do not use this

function.name: sound_get_gain
function.help: absolutely do not use this either

function.name: script_recompile
function.help: recompiles scripts.

function.name: script_doc
function.help: saves a file called hs_doc.txt with parameters for all script commands.

function.name: help
function.help: prints a description of the named function.

function.name: random_range
function.help: returns a random value in the range [lower bound, upper bound)

function.name: real_random_range
function.help: returns a random value in the range [lower bound, upper bound)

function.name: numeric_countdown_timer_set
function.help: <milliseconds>, <auto_start>

function.name: breakable_surfaces_enable
function.help: enables or disables breakability of all breakable surfaces on level

function.name: recording_play
function.help: make the specified unit run the specified cutscene recording.

function.name: recording_play_and_delete
function.help: make the specified unit run the specified cutscene recording, deletes the unit when the animation finishes.

function.name: recording_play_and_hover
function.help: make the specified vehicle run the specified cutscene recording, hovers the vehicle when the animation finishes.

function.name: recording_kill
function.help: kill the specified unit's cutscene recording.

function.name: recording_time
function.help: return the time remaining in the specified unit's cutscene recording.

function.name: object_set_ranged_attack_inhibited
function.help: FALSE prevents object from using ranged attack

function.name: object_set_melee_attack_inhibited
function.help: FALSE prevents object from using melee attack

function.name: objects_dump_memory
function.help: debugs object memory usage

function.name: object_set_collideable
function.help: FALSE prevents any object from colliding with the given object

function.name: object_set_scale
function.help: sets the scale for a given object and interpolates over the given number of frames to achieve that scale

function.name: objects_attach
function.help: attaches the second object to the first; both strings can be empty

function.name: objects_detach
function.help: detaches from the given parent object the given child object

function.name: garbage_collect_now
function.help: causes all garbage objects except those visible to a player to be collected immediately

function.name: object_cannot_take_damage
function.help: prevents an object from taking damage

function.name: object_can_take_damage
function.help: allows an object to take damage again

function.name: object_beautify
function.help: makes an object pretty for the remainder of the levels' cutscenes.

function.name: objects_predict
function.help: loads textures necessary to draw a objects that are about to come on-screen.

function.name: object_type_predict
function.help: loads textures necessary to draw an object that's about to come on-screen.

function.name: object_pvs_activate
function.help: just another (old) name for object_pvs_set_object.

function.name: object_pvs_set_object
function.help: sets the specified object as the special place that activates everything it sees.

function.name: object_pvs_set_camera
function.help: sets the specified cutscene camera point as the special place that activates everything it sees.

function.name: object_pvs_clear
function.help: removes the special place that activates everything it sees.

function.name: render_lights
function.help: enables/disables dynamic lights

function.name: scenery_get_animation_time
function.help: returns the number of ticks remaining in a custom animation (or zero, if the animation is over).

function.name: scenery_animation_start
function.help: starts a custom animation playing on a piece of scenery

function.name: scenery_animation_start_at_frame
function.help: starts a custom animation playing on a piece of scenery at a specific frame

function.name: unit_can_blink
function.help: allows a unit to blink or not (units never blink when they are dead)

function.name: unit_open
function.help: opens the hatches on the given unit

function.name: unit_close
function.help: closes the hatches on a given unit

function.name: unit_kill
function.help: kills a given unit, no saving throw

function.name: unit_kill_silent
function.help: kills a given unit silently (doesn't make them play their normal death animation or sound)

function.name: unit_get_custom_animation_time
function.help: returns the number of ticks remaining in a unit's custom animation (or zero, if the animation is over).

function.name: unit_stop_custom_animation
function.help: stops the custom animation running on the given unit.

function.name: unit_custom_animation_at_frame
function.help: starts a custom animation playing on a unit at a specific frame index(interpolates into animation if next to last parameter is TRUE)

function.name: custom_animation
function.help: starts a custom animation playing on a unit (interpolates into animation if last parameter is TRUE)

function.name: custom_animation_list
function.help: starts a custom animation playing on a unit list (interpolates into animation if last parameter is TRUE)

function.name: unit_is_playing_custom_animation
function.help: returns TRUE if the given unit is still playing a custom animation

function.name: unit_aim_without_turning
function.help: allows a unit to aim in place without turning

function.name: unit_set_emotion
function.help: sets a unit's facial expression (-1 is none, other values depend on unit)

function.name: unit_set_enterable_by_player
function.help: can be used to prevent the player from entering a vehicle

function.name: unit_enter_vehicle
function.help: puts the specified unit in the specified vehicle (in the named seat)

function.name: vehicle_test_seat_list
function.help: tests whether the named seat has an object in the object list

function.name: vehicle_test_seat
function.help: tests whether the named seat has a specified unit in it

function.name: unit_set_emotion_animation
function.help: sets the emotion animation to be used for the given unit

function.name: unit_exit_vehicle
function.help: makes a unit exit its vehicle

function.name: unit_set_maximum_vitality
function.help: sets a unit's maximum body and shield vitality

function.name: units_set_maximum_vitality
function.help: sets a group of units' maximum body and shield vitality

function.name: unit_set_current_vitality
function.help: sets a unit's current body and shield vitality

function.name: units_set_current_vitality
function.help: sets a group of units' current body and shield vitality

function.name: vehicle_load_magic
function.help: makes a list of units (named or by encounter) magically get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. CD-passenger... empty string matches all seats)

function.name: vehicle_unload
function.help: makes units get out of a vehicle from the substring-specified seats (e.g. CD-passenger... empty string matches all seats)

function.name: magic_seat_name
function.help: all units controlled by the player will assume the given seat name (valid values are 'asleep', 'alert', 'stand', 'crouch' and 'flee')

function.name: unit_set_seat
function.help: this unit will assume the named seat

function.name: magic_melee_attack
function.help: causes player's unit to start a melee attack

function.name: vehicle_riders
function.help: returns a list of all riders in a vehicle

function.name: vehicle_driver
function.help: returns the driver of a vehicle

function.name: vehicle_gunner
function.help: returns the gunner of a vehicle

function.name: unit_get_health
function.help: returns the health [0,1] of the unit, returns -1 if the unit does not exists

function.name: unit_get_shield
function.help: returns the shield [0,1] of the unit, returns -1 if the unit does not exists

function.name: unit_get_total_grenade_count
function.help: returns the total number of grenades for the given unit, 0 if it does not exist

function.name: unit_has_weapon
function.help: returns TRUE if the <unit> has <object> as a weapon, FALSE otherwise

function.name: unit_has_weapon_readied
function.help: returns TRUE if the <unit> has <object> as the primary weapon, FALSE otherwise

function.name: unit_doesnt_drop_items
function.help: prevents any of the given units from dropping weapons or grenades when they die

function.name: unit_impervious
function.help: prevents any of the given units from being knocked around or playing ping animations

function.name: unit_suspended
function.help: stops gravity from working on the given unit

function.name: unit_solo_player_integrated_night_vision_is_active
function.help: returns whether the night-vision mode could be activated via the flashlight button

function.name: units_set_desired_flashlight_state
function.help: sets the units' desired flashlight state

function.name: unit_set_desired_flashlight_state
function.help: sets the unit's desired flashlight state

function.name: unit_get_current_flashlight_state
function.help: gets the unit's current flashlight state

function.name: device_set_never_appears_locked
function.help: changes a machine's never_appears_locked flag, but only if paul is a bastard

function.name: device_get_power
function.help: gets the current power of a named device

function.name: device_set_power
function.help: immediately sets the power of a named device to the given value

function.name: device_set_position
function.help: set the desired position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups)

function.name: device_get_position
function.help: gets the current position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups)

function.name: device_set_position_immediate
function.help: instantaneously changes the position of the given device (used for devices without explicit device groups

function.name: device_group_get
function.help: returns the desired value of the specified device group.

function.name: device_group_set
function.help: changes the desired value of the specified device group.

function.name: device_group_set_immediate
function.help: instantaneously changes the value of the specified device group.

function.name: device_one_sided_set
function.help: TRUE makes the given device one-sided (only able to be opened from one direction), FALSE makes it two-sided

function.name: device_operates_automatically_set
function.help: TRUE makes the given device open automatically when any biped is nearby, FALSE makes it not

function.name: device_group_change_only_once_more_set
function.help: TRUE allows a device to change states only once

function.name: breakable_surfaces_reset
function.help: restores all breakable surfaces

function.name: cheat_all_powerups
function.help: drops all powerups near player

function.name: cheat_all_weapons
function.help: drops all weapons near player

function.name: cheat_spawn_warthog
function.help: drops a warthog near player

function.name: cheat_all_vehicles
function.help: drops all vehicles on player

function.name: cheat_teleport_to_camera
function.help: teleports player to camera location

function.name: cheat_active_camouflage
function.help: gives the player active camouflage

function.name: cheat_active_camouflage_local_player
function.help: gives the player active camouflage

function.name: cheats_load
function.help: reloads the cheats.txt file

function.name: ai_free
function.help: removes a group of actors from their encounter and sets them free

function.name: ai_free_units
function.help: removes a set of units from their encounter (if any) and sets them free

function.name: ai_attach
function.help: attaches the specified unit to the specified encounter.

function.name: ai_attach_free
function.help: attaches a unit to a newly created free actor of the specified type

function.name: ai_detach
function.help: detaches the specified unit from all AI.

function.name: ai_place
function.help: places the specified encounter on the map.

function.name: ai_kill
function.help: instantly kills the specified encounter and/or squad.

function.name: ai_kill_silent
function.help: instantly and silently (no animation or sound played) kills the specified encounter and/or squad.

function.name: ai_erase
function.help: erases the specified encounter and/or squad.

function.name: ai_erase_all
function.help: erases all AI.

function.name: ai_select
function.help: selects the specified encounter.

function.name: ai_deselect
function.help: clears the selected encounter.

function.name: ai_spawn_actor
function.help: spawns a single actor in the specified encounter and/or squad.

function.name: ai_set_respawn
function.help: enables or disables respawning in the specified encounter.

function.name: ai_set_deaf
function.help: enables or disables hearing for actors in the specified encounter.

function.name: ai_set_blind
function.help: enables or disables sight for actors in the specified encounter.

function.name: ai_magically_see_encounter
function.help: makes one encounter magically aware of another.

function.name: ai_magically_see_players
function.help: makes an encounter magically aware of nearby players.

function.name: ai_magically_see_unit
function.help: makes an encounter magically aware of the specified unit.

function.name: ai_timer_start
function.help: makes a squad's delay timer start counting.

function.name: ai_timer_expire
function.help: makes a squad's delay timer expire and releases them to enter combat.

function.name: ai_attack
function.help: makes the specified platoon(s) go into the attacking state.

function.name: ai_defend
function.help: makes the specified platoon(s) go into the defending state.

function.name: ai_retreat
function.help: makes all squads in the specified platoon(s) maneuver to their designated maneuver squads.

function.name: ai_maneuver
function.help: makes all squads in the specified platoon(s) maneuver to their designated maneuver squads.

function.name: ai_maneuver_enable
function.help: enables or disables the maneuver/retreat rule for an encounter or platoon. the rule will still trigger, but none of the actors will be given the order to change squads.

function.name: ai_migrate
function.help: makes all or part of an encounter move to another encounter.

function.name: ai_migrate_and_speak
function.help: makes all or part of an encounter move to another encounter, and say their 'advance' or 'retreat' speech lines.

function.name: ai_migrate_by_unit
function.help: makes a named vehicle or group of units move to another encounter.

function.name: ai_allegiance
function.help: creates an allegiance between two teams.

function.name: ai_allegiance_remove
function.help: destroys an allegiance between two teams.

function.name: ai_living_count
function.help: return the number of living actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

function.name: ai_living_fraction
function.help: return the fraction [0-1] of living actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

function.name: ai_strength
function.help: return the current strength (average body vitality from 0-1) of the specified encounter and/or squad.

function.name: ai_swarm_count
function.help: return the number of swarm actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

function.name: ai_nonswarm_count
function.help: return the number of non-swarm actors in the specified encounter and/or squad.

function.name: ai_actors
function.help: converts an ai reference to an object list.

function.name: ai_go_to_vehicle
function.help: tells a group of actors to get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. passenger for pelican)... does not interrupt any actors who are already going to vehicles

function.name: ai_go_to_vehicle_override
function.help: tells a group of actors to get into a vehicle, in the substring-specified seats (e.g. passenger for pelican)... NB: any actors who are already going to vehicles will stop and go to this one instead!

function.name: ai_going_to_vehicle
function.help: return the number of actors that are still trying to get into the specified vehicle

function.name: ai_exit_vehicle
function.help: tells a group of actors to get out of any vehicles that they are in

function.name: ai_braindead
function.help: makes a group of actors braindead, or restores them to life (in their initial state)

function.name: ai_braindead_by_unit
function.help: makes a list of objects braindead, or restores them to life. if you pass in a vehicle index, it makes all actors in that vehicle braindead (including any built-in guns)

function.name: ai_disregard
function.help: if TRUE, forces all actors to completely disregard the specified units, otherwise lets them acknowledge the units again

function.name: ai_prefer_target
function.help: if TRUE, *ALL* enemies will prefer to attack the specified units. if FALSE, removes the preference.

function.name: ai_teleport_to_starting_location
function.help: teleports a group of actors to the starting locations of their current squad(s)

function.name: ai_teleport_to_starting_location_if_unsupported
function.help: teleports a group of actors to the starting locations of their current squad(s), only if they are not supported by solid ground (i.e. if they are falling after switching BSPs)

function.name: ai_renew
function.help: refreshes the health and grenade count of a group of actors, so they are as good as new

function.name: ai_try_to_fight_nothing
function.help: removes the preferential target setting from a group of actors

function.name: ai_try_to_fight
function.help: causes a group of actors to preferentially target another group of actors

function.name: ai_try_to_fight_player
function.help: causes a group of actors to preferentially target the player

function.name: ai_command_list
function.help: tells a group of actors to begin executing the specified command list

function.name: ai_command_list_by_unit
function.help: tells a named unit to begin executing the specified command list

function.name: ai_command_list_advance
function.help: tells a group of actors that are running a command list that they may advance further along the list (if they are waiting for a stimulus)

function.name: ai_command_list_advance_by_unit
function.help: just like ai_command_list_advance but operates upon a unit instead

function.name: ai_command_list_status
function.help: gets the status of a number of units running command lists: 0 = none, 1 = finished command list, 2 = waiting for stimulus, 3 = running command list

function.name: ai_is_attacking
function.help: returns whether a platoon is in the attacking mode (or if an encounter is specified, returns whether any platoon in that encounter is attacking)

function.name: ai_force_active
function.help: forces an encounter to remain active (i.e. not freeze in place) even if there are no players nearby

function.name: ai_force_active_by_unit
function.help: forces a named actor that is NOT in an encounter to remain active (i.e. not freeze in place) even if there are no players nearby

function.name: ai_set_return_state
function.help: sets the state that a group of actors will return to when they have nothing to do

function.name: ai_set_current_state
function.help: sets the current state of a group of actors. WARNING: may have unpredictable results on actors that are in combat

function.name: ai_playfight
function.help: sets an encounter to be playfighting or not

function.name: ai_status
function.help: returns the most severe combat status of a group of actors (0=inactive, 1=noncombat, 2=guarding, 3=search/suspicious, 4=definite enemy(heard or magic awareness), 5=visible enemy, 6=engaging in combat.

function.name: ai_reconnect
function.help: reconnects all AI information to the current structure bsp (use this after you create encounters or command lists in sapien, or place new firing points or command list points)

function.name: ai_vehicle_encounter
function.help: sets a vehicle to 'belong' to a particular encounter/squad. any actors who get into the vehicle will be placed in this squad. NB: vehicles potentially drivable by multiple teams need their own encounter!

function.name: ai_vehicle_enterable_distance
function.help: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors within a certain distance

function.name: ai_vehicle_enterable_team
function.help: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors on a certain team

function.name: ai_vehicle_enterable_ai_default_state
function.help: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for actors of a certain type (grunt, elite, marine etc)

function.name: ai_vehicle_enterable_actors
function.help: sets a vehicle as being impulsively enterable for a certain encounter/squad of actors

function.name: ai_vehicle_enterable_disable
function.help: disables actors from impulsively getting into a vehicle (this is the default state for newly placed vehicles)

function.name: ai_look_at_object
function.help: tells an actor to look at an object until further notice

function.name: ai_stop_looking
function.help: tells an actor to stop looking at whatever it's looking at

function.name: ai_automatic_migration_target
function.help: enables or disables a squad as being an automatic migration target

function.name: ai_follow_target_disable
function.help: turns off following for an encounter

function.name: ai_follow_target_players
function.help: sets the follow target for an encounter to be the closest player

function.name: ai_follow_target_unit
function.help: sets the follow target for an encounter to be a specific unit

function.name: ai_follow_target_ai
function.help: sets the follow target for an encounter to be a group of AI (encounter, squad or platoon)

function.name: ai_follow_distance
function.help: sets the distance threshold which will cause squads to migrate when following someone

function.name: ai_conversation
function.help: tries to add an entry to the list of conversations waiting to play. returns FALSE if the required units could not be found to play the conversation, or if the player is too far away and the 'delay' flag is not set.

function.name: ai_conversation_stop
function.help: stops a conversation from playing or trying to play

function.name: ai_conversation_advance
function.help: tells a conversation that it may advance

function.name: ai_conversation_line
function.help: returns which line the conversation is currently playing, or 999 if the conversation is not currently playing

function.name: ai_conversation_status
function.help: returns the status of a conversation (0=none, 1=trying to begin, 2=waiting for guys to get in position, 3=playing, 4=waiting to advance, 5=could not begin, 6=finished successfully, 7=aborted midway

function.name: ai_link_activation
function.help: links the first encounter so that it will be made active whenever it detects that the second encounter is active

function.name: ai_berserk
function.help: forces a group of actors to start or stop berserking

function.name: ai_set_team
function.help: makes an encounter change to a new team

function.name: ai_allow_charge
function.help: either enables or disables charging behavior for a group of actors

function.name: ai_allow_dormant
function.help: either enables or disables automatic dormancy for a group of actors

function.name: ai_allegiance_broken
function.help: returns whether two teams have an allegiance that is currently broken by traitorous behavior

function.name: camera_control
function.help: toggles script control of the camera.

function.name: camera_set
function.help: moves the camera to the specified camera point over the specified number of ticks.

function.name: camera_set_relative
function.help: moves the camera to the specified camera point over the specified number of ticks (position is relative to the specified object).

function.name: camera_set_animation
function.help: begins a prerecorded camera animation.

function.name: camera_set_first_person
function.help: makes the scripted camera follow a unit.

function.name: camera_set_dead
function.help: makes the scripted camera zoom out around a unit as if it were dead.

function.name: camera_time
function.help: returns the number of ticks remaining in the current camera interpolation.

function.name: debug_camera_load
function.help: loads the saved camera position and facing.

function.name: debug_camera_save
function.help: saves the camera position and facing.

function.name: game_speed
function.help: changes the game speed.

function.name: game_time
function.help: gets ticks elapsed since the start of the game.

function.name: game_variant
function.help: set the game engine

function.name: game_difficulty_get
function.help: returns the current difficulty setting, but lies to you and will never return easy, instead returning normal

function.name: game_difficulty_get_real
function.help: returns the actual current difficulty setting without lying

function.name: profile_service_clear_timers
function.help: clears the timers that are present in the profiling service

function.name: profile_service_dump_timers
function.help: dumps the profiling service timers

function.name: map_reset
function.help: starts the map from the beginning.

function.name: map_name
function.help: changes the name of the solo player map.

function.name: multiplayer_map_name
function.help: changes the name of the multiplayer map

function.name: game_difficulty_set
function.help: changes the difficulty setting for the next map to be loaded.

function.name: crash
function.help: crashes (for debugging).

function.name: switch_bsp
function.help: takes off your condom and changes to a different structure bsp

function.name: structure_bsp_index
function.help: returns the current structure bsp index

function.name: version
function.help: prints the build version.

function.name: playback
function.help: starts game in film playback mode

function.name: quit
function.help: quits the game

function.name: texture_cache_flush
function.help: don't make me kick your ass

function.name: sound_cache_flush
function.help: i'm a rebel!

function.name: sound_cache_dump_to_file
function.help: dump dat shit!

function.name: debug_memory
function.help: dumps memory leaks.

function.name: debug_memory_by_file
function.help: dumps memory leaks by source file.

function.name: debug_memory_for_file
function.help: dumps memory leaks from the specified source file.

function.name: debug_tags
function.help: writes all memory being used by tag files into tag_dump.txt

function.name: profile_reset
function.help: resets profiling data.

function.name: profile_dump
function.help: dumps profile based on a substring.

function.name: profile_activate
function.help: activates profile sections based on a substring.

function.name: profile_deactivate
function.help: deactivates profile sections based on a substring.

function.name: profile_graph_toggle
function.help: enables or disables profile graph display of a particular value.

function.name: debug_pvs
function.help: displays the current pvs.

function.name: radiosity_start
function.help: starts radiosity computation.

function.name: radiosity_save
function.help: saves radiosity solution.

function.name: radiosity_debug_point
function.help: tests sun occlusion at a point.

function.name: ai
function.help: turns all AI on or off.

function.name: ai_dialogue_triggers
function.help: turns impromptu dialogue on or off.

function.name: ai_grenades
function.help: turns grenade inventory on or off.

function.name: ai_lines
function.help: cycles through AI line-spray modes

function.name: ai_debug_sound_point_set
function.help: drops the AI debugging sound point at the camera location

function.name: ai_debug_vocalize
function.help: makes the selected AI vocalize

function.name: ai_debug_teleport_to
function.help: teleports all players to the specified encounter

function.name: ai_debug_speak
function.help: makes the currently selected AI speak a vocalization (e.g. ai_speak "pain minor")

function.name: ai_debug_speak_list
function.help: makes the currently selected AI speak a list of vocalizations (e.g. ai_speak_list "involuntary")

function.name: fade_in
function.help: does a screen fade in from a particular color

function.name: fade_out
function.help: does a screen fade out to a particular color

function.name: cinematic_start
function.help: initializes game to start a cinematic (interruptive) cutscene

function.name: cinematic_stop
function.help: initializes the game to end a cinematic (interruptive) cutscene

function.name: cinematic_abort
function.help: aborts a cinematic

function.name: cinematic_show_letterbox
function.help: sets or removes the letterbox bars

function.name: cinematic_set_title
function.help: activates the chapter title

function.name: cinematic_set_title_delayed
function.help: activates the chapter title, delayed by <real> seconds

function.name: cinematic_suppress_bsp_object_creation
function.help: suppresses or enables the automatic creation of objects during cutscenes due to a bsp switch

function.name: game_won
function.help: causes the player to successfully finish the current level and move to the next

function.name: game_lost
function.help: causes the player to revert to his previous saved game

function.name: game_safe_to_save
function.help: returns FALSE if it would be a bad idea to save the player's game right now

function.name: game_all_quiet
function.help: returns FALSE if there are bad guys around, projectiles in the air, etc.

function.name: game_safe_to_speak
function.help: returns FALSE if it would be a bad idea to save the player's game right now

function.name: game_is_cooperative
function.help: returns TRUE if the game is cooperative

function.name: game_save
function.help: checks to see if it is safe to save game, then saves (gives up after 8 seconds)

function.name: game_save_cancel
function.help: cancels any pending game_save, timeout or not

function.name: game_save_no_timeout
function.help: checks to see if it is safe to save game, then saves (this version never gives up)

function.name: game_save_totally_unsafe
function.help: disregards player's current situation

function.name: game_saving
function.help: checks to see if the game is trying to save the map.

function.name: game_revert
function.help: reverts to last saved game, if any (for testing, the first bastard that does this to me gets it in the head)

function.name: game_reverted
function.help: don't use this for anything, you black-hearted bastards.

function.name: core_save
function.help: saves debug game state to core\core.bin

function.name: core_save_name
function.help: saves debug game state to core\<path>

function.name: core_load
function.help: loads debug game state from core\core.bin

function.name: core_load_at_startup
function.help: loads debug game state from core\core.bin as soon as the map is initialized

function.name: core_load_name
function.help: loads debug game state from core\<path>

function.name: core_load_name_at_startup
function.help: loads debug game state from core\<path> as soon as the map is initialized

function.name: game_skip_ticks
function.help: skips <short> amount of game ticks. ONLY USE IN CUTSCENES!!!

function.name: sound_impulse_predict
function.help: loads an impulse sound into the sound cache ready for playback.

function.name: sound_impulse_start
function.help: plays an impulse sound from the specified source object (or "none"), with the specified scale.

function.name: sound_impulse_time
function.help: returns the time remaining for the specified impulse sound.

function.name: sound_impulse_stop
function.help: stops the specified impulse sound.

function.name: sound_looping_predict
function.help: your mom.

function.name: sound_looping_start
function.help: plays a looping sound from the specified source object (or "none"), with the specified scale.

function.name: sound_looping_stop
function.help: stops the specified looping sound.

function.name: sound_looping_set_scale
function.help: changes the scale of the sound (which should affect the volume) within the range 0 to 1.

function.name: sound_looping_set_alternate
function.help: enables or disables the alternate loop/alternate end for a looping sound.

function.name: debug_sounds_enable
function.help: enables or disabled all sound classes matching the substring.

function.name: debug_sounds_distances
function.help: changes the minimum and maximum distances for all sound classes matching the substring.

function.name: debug_sounds_wet
function.help: changes the reverb level for all sound classes matching the substring.

function.name: sound_enable
function.help: enables or disables all sound.

function.name: sound_set_master_gain
function.help: Set the game's master gain

function.name: sound_get_master_gain
function.help: Returns the game's master gain

function.name: sound_set_music_gain
function.help: Set the game's music gain

function.name: sound_get_music_gain
function.help: Returns the game's music gain

function.name: sound_set_effects_gain
function.help: Set the game's effects gain

function.name: sound_get_effects_gain
function.help: Returns the game's effects gain

function.name: sound_class_set_gain
function.help: changes the gain on the specified sound class(es) to the specified game over the specified number of ticks.

function.name: vehicle_hover
function.help: stops the vehicle from running real physics and runs fake hovering physics instead.

function.name: players_unzoom_all
function.help: resets zoom levels on all players

function.name: player_enable_input
function.help: toggle player input. the player can still free-look, but nothing else.

function.name: player_camera_control
function.help: enables/disables camera control globally

function.name: player_action_test_reset
function.help: resets the player action test state so that all tests will return false.

function.name: player_action_test_jump
function.help: returns true if any player has jumped since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_primary_trigger
function.help: returns true if any player has used primary trigger since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_grenade_trigger
function.help: returns true if any player has used grenade trigger since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_zoom
function.help: returns true if any player has hit the zoom button since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_action
function.help: returns true if any player has hit the action key since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_accept
function.help: returns true if any player has hit accept since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_back
function.help: returns true if any player has hit the back key since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_look_relative_up
function.help: returns true if any player has looked up since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_look_relative_down
function.help: returns true if any player has looked down since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_look_relative_left
function.help: returns true if any player has looked left since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_look_relative_right
function.help: returns true if any player has looked right since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_look_relative_all_directions
function.help: returns true if any player has looked up, down, left, and right since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_action_test_move_relative_all_directions
function.help: returns true if any player has moved forward, backward, left, and right since the last call to (player_action_test_reset).

function.name: player_add_equipment
function.help: adds/resets the player's health, shield, and inventory (weapons and grenades) to the named profile. resets if third parameter is true, adds if false.

function.name: show_hud
function.help: shows or hides the hud

function.name: show_hud_help_text
function.help: shows or hides the hud help text

function.name: enable_hud_help_flash
function.help: starts/stops the help text flashing

function.name: hud_help_flash_restart
function.help: resets the timer for the help text flashing

function.name: activate_nav_point_flag
function.help: activates a nav point type <string> attached to (local) player <unit> anchored to a flag with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

function.name: activate_nav_point_object
function.help: activates a nav point type <string> attached to (local) player <unit> anchored to an object with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

function.name: activate_team_nav_point_flag
function.help: activates a nav point type <string> attached to a team anchored to a flag with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

function.name: activate_team_nav_point_object
function.help: activates a nav point type <string> attached to a team anchored to an object with a vertical offset <real>. If the player is not local to the machine, this will fail

function.name: deactivate_nav_point_flag
function.help: deactivates a nav point type attached to a player <unit> anchored to a flag

function.name: deactivate_nav_point_object
function.help: deactivates a nav point type attached to a player <unit> anchored to an object

function.name: deactivate_team_nav_point_flag
function.help: deactivates a nav point type attached to a team anchored to a flag

function.name: deactivate_team_nav_point_object
function.help: deactivates a nav point type attached to a team anchored to an object

function.name: cls
function.help: clears console text from the screen

function.name: connect
function.help: Attempt to connect to server - use ip:port password as parameters

function.name: disconnect
function.help: Disconnect from a server

function.name: hammer_begin
function.help: hammers the server by connecting and disconnecting repeatedly.

function.name: hammer_stop
function.help: stops hammering the server.

function.name: network_server_dump
function.help: Dumps info on network server.

function.name: network_client_dump
function.help: Dumps info on network client.

function.name: net_graph_clear
function.help: Clears the net_graph.

function.name: net_graph_show
function.help: Changes the net_graph display (bytes/packets, sent/received)

function.name: play_update_history
function.help: Playback client input history starting from the specified last completed update id.

function.name: show_player_update_stats
function.help: Shows update history playback stats.

function.name: message_metrics_clear
function.help: clears network messaging metrics

function.name: message_metrics_dump
function.help: dumps network messaging metrics to given file ("" for default)

function.name: error_overflow_suppression
function.help: enables or disables the suppression of error spamming

function.name: structure_lens_flares_place
function.help: places lens flares in the structure bsp

function.name: player_effect_set_max_vibrate
function.help: <left> <right>

function.help: <max_intensity> <attack time>

function.name: hud_show_shield

function.help: starts/stops manual blinking of the shield panel

function.name: hud_set_objective_text

function.help: sets the warning time for the timer to <short> minutes and <short> seconds

function.name: hud_set_timer_position

function.name: show_hud_timer

function.name: pause_hud_timer
function.help: pauses or unpauses the hud timer

function.name: ui_widget_show_path
function.help: blah blah

function.help: Returns true if EAX extensions are enabled

function.help: deactivates an enumerated joystick, freeing up the logical joystick slot

function.help: test function to configure a single control

function.name: set_yaw_rate

function.name: set_pitch_rate
function.help: sets the yaw rate for the given player number

function.help: sets the scale for gamepad control of pitch

function.name: bind
function.help: binds an input device/button combination to a game control

function.name: unbind
function.help: unbinds an input device/button combination

function.name: print_binds
function.help: prints a list of all input bindings

function.name: sv_end_game
function.help: End the current game.

function.name: change_team
function.help: change your team (0=red,1=blue,else=auto

function.name: sv_mapcycle
function.help: Print the contents of the currently loaded mapcycle file

function.name: sv_mapcycle_begin
function.help: Restart or begin playing the currently loaded mapcycle file

function.name: sv_mapcycle_add
function.help: Usage: sv_mapcycle_add <mapname> <variantname> Add a new game to the end of the mapcycle file.

function.name: sv_mapcycle_del
function.help: Usage: sv_mapcycle_del <index> Removes the game at <index>. Will not affect running games.

function.name: sv_map_next
function.help: <Server Only> Abort the current game and begin the next game in the playlist

function.name: sv_map_reset
function.help: <Server Only> Reset the current game

function.name: sv_map
function.help: <Server Only> Usage: "sv_map <mapname> <variantname>" Abort current game and playlist and start specified game

function.name: rcon
function.help: Sends a command for server to execute at console. Use \" to send quotes.

function.name: sv_rcon_password
function.help: Sets the server remote console password. If no password is given, displays the current password. Enter "" to disable rcon.

function.name: sv_say
function.help: <Server Only> Usage: "sv_say <message>" Send a message to users

function.name: sv_players
function.help: <Server Only> Print a list of players in the current game

function.name: sv_kick
function.help: <Server Only> Usage: sv_kick <player # or name> Kicks the specified player from the server

function.name: sv_ban
function.help: <Server Only> Player is kicked and added to banned.txt. Use sv_players to find the index. Specify optional duration for timed ban. Use 0 to follow sv_ban_penalty rules.

function.name: sv_banlist
function.help: Print a list of banned players

function.name: sv_unban
function.help: <Server Only> Usage: sv_unban <index> Removes player at index in the banlist. Use sv_banlist to find the index

function.name: sv_parameters_reload
function.help: <Server Only> Usage: sv_parameters_reload Reloads the parameters.cfg file.

function.name: sv_parameters_dump
function.help: Dumps out the local parameter configuration to parameters.cfg file.

function.name: sv_status
function.help: Shows status of the server

function.name: sv_name
function.help: Sets the name of the server. If no name is given, displays the current name.

function.name: sv_password
function.help: Sets the server password. If no password is given, displays the current password.

function.name: sv_log_note
function.help: Leave a note in the server log

function.name: sv_log_file
function.help: Sets the server log file name. If no name is given, displays the current log file name.

function.name: sv_log_enabled
function.help: Enables or disables server logging. If 0/1 is not given, displays the current logging status.

function.name: sv_log_rotation_threshold
function.help: Sets the log rotation threshold. When a log file's size (in kilobytes) exceeds this number, it will be rotated. Set to 0 to disable log rotation. If the threshold is not specified, displays the current threshold.

function.name: sv_log_echo_chat
function.help: Enables or disbles chat echo to the console. Set the preference to 0 to disable chat echo, or 1 to enable chat echo. If the preference is not specified, displays the current preference.

function.name: profile_load
function.help: Load any included builtin profiles and create profiles on disk.

function.name: track_remote_player_position_updates
function.help: Sets the name of the remote player whose position update are to be tracked.

function.name: remote_player_stats
function.help: Displays the prediction stats of the specified remote player.

function.name: sv_get_player_action_queue_length
function.help: Displays the action queue length for the specified player.

function.name: thread_sleep
function.help: Sleeps the calling thread for the specified number of ms.

function.name: checkpoint_save
function.help: save last solo checkpoint

function.name: checkpoint_load
function.help: load a saved checkpoint

function.name: sv_maplist
function.help: Display a list of maps, matching an optional substring.

function.name: sv_gamelist
function.help: Display a list of game types, matching an optional substring.

function.name: sv_friendly_fire
function.help: Use to provide a global override for the gametype friendly fire setting.

function.name: sv_timelimit
function.help: Use to provide a global override for the gametype timelimit setting.

function.name: sv_ban_penalty
function.help: Specify up to 4 ban times for repeat ban/TK offenders.

function.name: sv_tk_grace
function.help: Specify the grace period for TK during which you don't get a TK point.

function.name: sv_tk_cooldown
function.help: Specify a TK point cooldown period, after which players lose a TK point.

function.name: sv_banlist_file
function.help: Sets and opens the file to be used for the player ban list.

function.name: sv_maxplayers
function.help: Sets the maximum number of players (between 1 and 16). If no value is given, displays the current value.

function.name: sv_single_flag_force_reset
function.help: Force the flag to reset in single flag CTF games when the timer expires, even if held by a player. If not specified, displays the current value.

function.name: sv_motd
function.help: Sets the server message of the day file name. If no name is given, displays the current motd file name. Set to "" to turn motd off.

function.name: oid_watch
function.help: Sets/displays translated object table watch parameters.

function.name: oid_dump
function.help: dumps the whole translated object table to network.log

function.name: oid_status
function.help: displays the status of the translated object table.
